Adhere strictly to safety regulations: Compliance with IEC 60335-2-23 Overheat Protection Standards
Presence of Critical Safety Certifications (e.g., ETL, UL, CE)
Obtain robust safety certifications and: Certification from Specific International Standards (e.g., ISO 9001, IEC 60204)
Compliance with Defined EMC Standards (e.g., CISPR 14-1)
